member.name: DLLVERSIONINFO2
member.summary: Receives DLL-specific version information. It is used with the DllGetVersion function.

member.name: DLLVERSIONINFO2.info1
member.summary: A structure. This member is included to provide backward compatibility with applications that are not expecting a DLLVERSIONINFO2 structure.

member.name: DLLVERSIONINFO2.ullVersion
member.summary: A value that contains the version information. It is divided into four 16-bitfields containing the major and minor version numbers, the build number, and the hotfix version, in that order. Use the macro to construct this value.
